Listen to Our Music

Rekiem

Omar Serna had a very eclectic musical influence in which he listened from 80's rock, cult pop and synth pop to dance, new age, metal and finally dance of the 90's and trance where his passion for electronic music began. It was finally when he heard a track of Infected Mushroom, and at that moment, he was trapped by the psychedelic trance and from there. Omar played in some local events in which he participated in his time with his brother and friends. The style of ReKieM is very dynamic, which generally goes from less to more beats passing through the subgenres of Psytrance, Psy Tech-Trance, Tribal, Full-On, Nitzhonot and Full-On Night; all mixed in a unique and different way in a range between 140 and 148 BPM in a single session, which makes it a DJ Set unique in its class that you don’t want miss.

Music

Rekiem · In Memoriam to Olli
